# LLM ATLAS

Registry of agentic coding toolchains. Ranked by the community, verified for the machine era.

## Summary
LLM Atlas is a curated, filterable directory of autonomous coding tools, IDEs, and APIs. It allows users to browse, search, and vote on toolchains designed for the agentic coding era.

## Core Purpose
To provide a decentralized, community-driven index of high-quality tools that facilitate AI-driven software engineering.

## Key Metadata
- **URL**: https://llmatlas.pages.dev
- **Categories**: IDE, CLI, Web, API
- **Pricing**: Free, Freemium, Paid
- **License**: Open Source, Closed Source
- **Main Features**: Idempotent voting, real-time search, deep-linked filtering, tool submission portal.

## Contributing
Users can submit new tools via the "SUBMIT TOOL" portal. Suggestions are peer-reviewed and promoted to the main registry after validation.
